Reviews Contacts Privacy Policy VeloRide India (hereinafter referred to as "we", "our" or "company") respects your right to privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, share and protect the information you provide to us when you use our website and services. Collection and use of information We collect information about you when you contact us through our website, fill out bike booking forms, subscribe to our newsletter or otherwise interact with us. This information may include your name, email address, telephone number, address and other data that you provide voluntarily. We use the information you provide to process your inquiries, book bikes, provide services and communicate with you about your inquiry or booking. We may also use your information to improve our services, analyze trends and provide you with a personalized experience. Storage and protection of information We take measures to keep your personal information secure and prevent unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction of data. We use various technical and organizational security measures such as data encryption, limited access to information and regular software updates to protect your information from loss, theft or leakage. Transfer of data to third parties We do not sell, trade or share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except as required by law or necessary to fulfill our obligations to you (such as processing payments, processing reservations and shipping goods). Any changes will be posted on this page and you will be notified of any material changes to the way we collect, use and protect your information. Contacting Us If you have any questions or suggestions regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us.
